taskbody.title: Add an Address
taskbody.prereq: To ADD an address, log into your MyPack Portal:

step.cmd: From the left-hand naviagation menu, selct 'Addresses'
Under the appropriate header, e.g. 'Diploma Address,' if no address is defined, select the 'Add Diploma Address' button
You can either select the 'Copy From' button to copy the address from an address that is already on record, or manually enter an address in the given fields
